title: How to windsurf
brief_description: This video is designed to teach windsurfing in seven lessons. Information on how to assemble the board, how to get underway, steering, tacking, gybing and a section concerning safety are included. The video is designed so that each lesson is self-contained. The lessons are aimed at beginners of any age.
